mapper.insert: insert into payment (order_no, p_idx, m_idx, id, name, phone, service_amount, pay_amount, point, commission, pay_method, pay_status, approved_at, title, imp_uid, token, sub_title, end_date) values (#{order_no}, #{p_idx}, 1, #{id}, #{name}, #{phone}, #{service_amount}, #{pay_amount}, #{point}, #{commission}, #{pay_method}, #{pay_status}, SYSDATE, #{title}, #{imp_uid}, #{token}, #{sub_title}, #{end_date})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM payment where m_idx=#{m_idx} order by approved_at desc
mapper.update: update payment set pay_status='D' where order_no=#{order_no}
